projects.heading: The Non-profit MVP story
projects.summary: A US client’s MVP built by a 3 person team and launched in 6 months resulted in $1M+ funding
projects.details: Grasshopper is a US based 13+ years old company providing cloud based telephony services to startups. They wanted to enter international markets and expand. But their decade old system was not scaling. So they wanted to re-architect and rebuild their core system. MicroService Architecture. API based system. Adhersion.

cta.heading: LET’S CRAFT AWESOME PRODUCTS!
cta.content: We combine our software and product craftsmanship with our client’s disruptive ideas to achieve their business goals with high ROI.
